mapper.sql: id, type, name, address, area, lessor, lessorid, lessorphone, lessee, lesseeid, lesseephone, extend, addtime, updatetime policeid, policeid, policename,policearea
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_place (id, type, name, address, area, lessor, lessorid, lessorphone, lessee, lesseeid, lesseephone, extend, addtime, updatetime, policeid, policename, policearea ) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{address}, #{area}, #{lessor}, #{lessorid}, #{lessorphone}, #{lessee}, #{lesseeid}, #{lesseephone}, #{extend}, #{addtime}, #{updatetime}, #{policeid}, #{policename}, #{policearea} )
mapper.update: update t_place set type = #{type}, name = #{name}, address = #{address}, area = #{area}, lessor = #{lessor}, lessorid = #{lessorid}, lessorphone = #{lessorphone}, lessee = #{lessee}, lesseeid = #{lesseeid}, lesseephone = #{lesseephone}, extend = #{extend}, updatetime = #{updatetime} where id = #{id}
